text: Ivan () is a 1932 Soviet drama movie directed by Alexander Dovzhenko.ИВАН (1932)29 пальм и один золотой лев It stars K. Bondarevsky, Dmitry Golubinsky, and Elena Golki. == Actors == * K. Bondarevsky as Young Ivan * Dmitry Golubinsky as Secretary * Elena Golki as Mother of Killed Worker * Maksim Gornatko * Aleksandr Zapolsky as Supervisor * Pyotr Masokha as Ivan Guba == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1932 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Alexander Dovzhenko
title: Ivan (1932 movie)
